# sharingService(_:willShareItems:)

**Instance Method**

Invoked when the sharing service will share the specified items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func sharingService(_ sharingService: NSSharingService, willShareItems items: [Any])
```

## Parameters

- **sharingService**: The sharing service.
- **items**: The items being shared.

## Sharing Items

- **sharingService(_:didShareItems:)**: Invoked when the sharing service has finished sharing the items.
- **sharingService(_:didFailToShareItems:error:)**: Invoked when the sharing service encountered an error when sharing items.

items.description: Invoked when the sharing service has finished sharing the items.
items.name: sharingService(_:didShareItems:)

items.description: Invoked when the sharing service encountered an error when sharing items.
items.name: sharingService(_:didFailToShareItems:error:)
